lines.text: Steve, this is the hardest thing I've ever had to do. The kahuna put a kapu on you.
Not exactly, but you're taboo. No one of Hawaiian blood may speak to you.
It's Mister McGarrett... or Steve. And Kimo... get used to the name. It's Hawaiian for James.
Oh, and get used to being used to being called "Kimo." It's Hawaiian for James.
The message, Mister Alika, is that I am not McGarrett. And you and me are going to have a whole different kind of relationship!

[to Tony Alika, who has just burst into McGarrett's office to rant about the vigilantes]
I suggest you file form blah-blah-blah-blah, assault, or if you like, form blah-blah-blah-blah-blah, aggravated assault.
